DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test hypothesis use BirthTrack management labor shortens time delivery thus improve maternal perinatal outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Study Determine Monitoring Labor Shortens Time Delivery
DOC.criteria: The patient must â‰¥ 18 year old Nulliparous Singleton fetus vertex presentation Gestational age 360/7 Reassuring fetal heart trace Any significant medical condition Investigator 's opinion may interfere patient 's optimal participation study Low lie placenta ( edge 3cm less cervix ) Known suspect fetal maternal infection Maternal thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 100,000 ) Maternal bleed disorder Women previous uterine surgery Known major fetal malformation Suspected fetal growth restriction ( EFW < 10th percentile ) Subjects significant psychiatric history Major maternal morbidity ( e.g . major cardiac disease ) Subjects indication immediate delivery Limit cervical dilation ( e.g. , 7 cm . ) Prolonged rupture membrane ( i.e. , > 24 hour )
